alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 8:25PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion and northeastern Boone Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Diamond City, or 16 miles southeast of Forsyth, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Price Place... Ozark Isle... Peel... Bull Shoals Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
